message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find very valuable. Given its potential benefits for you, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 significantly undervalues the product's worth.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This is a very competitive offer considering the value it will bring you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle again, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500
Bob, it seems like we're both serious about this deal.  How about we split the difference between our previous offers and settle at $10,500? This is my final offer.
I understand your position, but I'm willing to go up to $9,750
